verbs.description: Thanks to Trump ’s decision to [V: exit] [ARG1: the Iran deal] , Israel and Iran are running out of reasons not to escalate their low - key conflict in Syria into a broader regional catastrophe .
Thanks to Trump ’s decision to exit the Iran deal , Israel and Iran [V: are] running out of reasons not to escalate their low - key conflict in Syria into a broader regional catastrophe .

[ARGM-CAU: Thanks to Trump ’s decision to exit the Iran deal] , [ARG0: Israel and Iran] are [V: running] out [ARG1: of reasons not to escalate their low - key conflict in Syria into a broader regional catastrophe] .

Thanks to Trump ’s decision to exit the Iran deal , [ARG0: Israel and Iran] are running out of [ARG3: reasons] [ARGM-NEG: not] to [V: escalate] [ARG1: their low - key conflict in Syria] [ARG4: into a broader regional catastrophe] .
